resources.string: To use Vidify TV, you\'ll also need the desktop app Vidify installed on the computer where the music is playing. Both the computer with Vidify and the device with Vidify TV have to be in the same network. You can read more about how to install it in the GitHub website (via the QR code, or directly at https://github.com/vidify/vidify).
To use the app without ads, please obtain a subscription to Vidify TV.
Share the app via this QR-code
You can also visit the Play Store page at http://bit.ly/vidifyapp, and check out the GitHub project at https://github.com/vidify/vidify
